title: font help
content:
Hi

can anyone identify the attached font or do you think it is bespoke ?

thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [giveup.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020015718/http:/typophile.com/files/giveup.jpg) | 100.49 KB |
author: monkonfire

comments.content:
This is not it.  
Surprisingly close, but no extended strokes on the tops of the /E and /P...  
 [www.dafont.com/search.php?q=VTCSuper&text=GIVE UP!](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020015718/http:/typophile.com/wiki/www.dafont.com/search.php%3Fq%3DVTCSuper%2526text%3DGIVE%20UP%21)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020015718im_/http:/typophile.com/files/give1_6160.jpg)
Komika Title (dafont) is also close but no extended strokes on E and P (those could be added)

What fonts are there with an "S" like that?

hhp

A bunch of the old phototype brush fonts on pages 88-91 of the Solotype Catalog share many characteristics, including that style of "S". Known digital versions are referenced [in the Solopedia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020015718/http:/abfonts.freehostia.com/solo/brush.htm).
Thanks folks - top marks Jan cheers
